title: Mental Health Web Platform
description: From this AI-Assisted web platform where mental health seekers can register and use functionalities like NLP (Natural Language Processing) - based chatbot for personality assessment.

title: Beauty & Skin Web Platform
description: The Beauty & Skin Web Platform is an online platform designed to cater to the needs of beauty enthusiasts, skincare aficionados. Utilizing a combination of HTML, CSS, PHP, and SQL.

title: E Commerce Front End
description: The React-based E-Commerce Front End offers a responsive shopping experience, featuring dynamic product catalog browsing, and user authentication for personalized interactions.

title: Photography Web Page
description: A responsive photographer web page project showcasing a professional portfolio. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a dynamic and visually immersive experience.
